books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A novel presenting a dystopian future under a totalitarian regime.

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the roaring twenties.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: A science fiction novel set in the distant future amidst a sprawling feudal interstellar empire.

books.title: Neuromancer
books.author: William Gibson
books.description: A novel about a washed-up computer hacker hired by a mysterious employer to pull off the ultimate hack.

books.title: Foundation
books.author: Isaac Asimov
books.description: The first book in the Foundation Series, a science fiction saga.

books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: A book that explores the history and impact of Homo sapiens.

books.title: A Brief History of Time
books.author: Stephen Hawking
books.description: An exploration of cosmology, explaining concepts like black holes and the Big Bang.

books.title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
books.author: Rebecca Skloot
books.description: A non-fiction book about the HeLa cell line, derived from cervical cancer cells taken from Henrietta Lacks.

books.title: Cosmos
books.author: Carl Sagan
books.description: A popular science book exploring various scientific subjects, including the history of science, cosmology, and the universe.

books.title: The Selfish Gene
books.author: Richard Dawkins
books.description: A book on evolutionary biology, exploring the gene as the unit of selection.

books.title: The Elegant Universe
books.author: Brian Greene
books.description: A book about string theory and theoretical physics.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A memoir recounting the author's experiences growing up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho and her journey to education.

books.title: Steve Jobs
books.author: Walter Isaacson
books.description: A biography of Steve Jobs, co-founder of Apple Inc., based on more than forty interviews with Jobs conducted over two years.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: A memoir by the former United States First Lady Michelle Obama.

books.title: Atomic Habits: An Easy & Proven Way to Build Good Habits & Break Bad Ones
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A self-help book offering practical strategies for creating good habits and breaking bad ones.

books.title: The Power of Now: A Guide to Spiritual Enlightenment
books.author: Eckhart Tolle
books.description: A guide to spiritual awakening and living in the present moment.

books.title: Mindset: The New Psychology of Success
books.author: Carol S. Dweck
books.description: A book that discusses the concept of 'growth mindset' versus 'fixed mindset' and how it affects success.
